description:
OPEN BY APPOINTMENT ONLY - CONTACT LUKE TO VIEW

First time offered in over 30 years!

Discover your winning rural lifestyle, perfect for large extended family and enjoy the serenity of this rural setting located in the best location in Wattleup

It's not often that a property like this one comes to market. This stunning family residence is situated on 1.04 hectares (2.5 acres) of land, spanning across two street frontages, and offers everything you could possibly need or imagine. If you enjoy spaciousness, combined with a love of the outdoors & most importantly the animals, this property is a must see!

Internal Features include, but are not limited to:
• Entertainers delight kitchen with freestanding oven, triple fridge recess, plenty of cupboards space, pantry & dishwasher overlooking the beautiful rural vista
• Master-bedroom suite is huge and features split-system air-conditioning and a commodious ensuite bathroom - shower, toilet, heat lamps and all.
• 4 Large Bedrooms with Bamboozle Bamboo flooring
• Beautifully presented 2nd bathroom with Shower, Bath & Separate toilet
• Study to the front of the entry with NBN (this could easily be used as another bedroom!)
• The double garage to the front of the home has been beautifully converted into a studio with it's own access which again could be used as another bedroom if needed, giving you so many different options.
• Large family room with split-system air-conditioning and character brickwork
• High ceilings throughout
• Large functional laundry including a shower with outdoor access to the back patio.

External features include but not limited to:
• Huge driveway that wraps around the frond hardstand for extra cars, caravans and even the boat!
• Glorious below ground pool
• Big patio area ideal for entertaining with large gazebo area
• Fully fenced large tennis court to the front of the property
• Double lock up garage to the back of the home
• 6 Paddocks
• 6 Walk in walk out yards
• Large powered workshop to the back of the home with Mezzanine floor and separate feeding shed which could be used for extra storage
• Veggie Garden
• Bores with reticulated paddocks
• Large water tank servicing the home
• Three phase power
• Leached Drains
• Fish Pond
• Fully fenced throughout

This is only a snapshot of what you can expect within this pristinely appointed residence, so get ready to call 28 Collis Road, Wattleup your new family home!

Only walking distance away from picturesque lakes and nature reserves, just minutes to beautiful beaches and the Henderson industrial area and easy access to Port Coogee, Fremantle, Aubin Grove Railway Station, the freeway, schools, shopping, medical facilities and even Cockburn Central, there is a surprising sense of convenience that accompanies this serene country-like lifestyle. This is what dreams are made of!

This 2.5-acre rural block is located just off Russell Road, between the growing urban development and the newly created commercial precinct of Latitude 32 to the South, and offers you the tranquil living environment that is normally only available by relocating to the country.

An array of shopping centres located within 5km with restaurants and fast food options, including, Harvest Lakes Shopping Centre, Beeliar Lakefront, Beeliar Village, The Hive Beeliar, IGA Xpress Aubin Grove, and Cockburn Gateways with a multitude of variety stores.

This immaculately presented home ticks all of the boxes for a fantastic family friendly home. This one definitely won't last long in this market, so ensure to give Luke a call to view as this Property will ONLY be open by Appointment.

To find out more about this property, you can contact agent Luke Langford on 0427 251 211 or luke@shellabears.com.au

Disclaimer:
This information is provided for general information purposes only and is based on information provided by the Seller and may be subject to change. No warranty or representation is made as to its accuracy and interested parties should place no reliance on it and should make their own independent enquiries.
